page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: In Chardstock there is very little traffic in the village compared to towns like Chard and Axminster.During mornings many lorries pass by including Milk Tankers,Tractors and Heavy Goods vehicles.Most villagers have cars and this makes villagelanes busy.Just recently the roads have a new surface put on over the old one which had pot holes.Going past the village school is the main village road and much of the village traffic goes along this road.The service bus runs from Chard to Axminster and stops hourly at Tytherleigh.The bus runs along the Fossway.A private coach bus runs to Axminster and back on market day each Thursday. Another bus runs from the village once a week to Chard.
